title: 旧约 - 以赛亚书(Isaiah) - 第 62 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 以赛亚书(Isaiah) -- 第 62 章 ( 本篇共有 66 章 )

lineList.en: For Zion's sake will I not hold my peace, and for Jerusalem's sake I will not rest, until the righteousness thereof go forth as brightness, and the salvation thereof as a lamp that burneth.
lineList.cn: 我因锡安必不静默，为耶路撒冷必不息声，直到他的公义如光辉发出，他的救恩如明灯发亮。

lineList.en: And the Gentiles shall see thy righteousness, and all kings thy glory: and thou shalt be called by a new name, which the mouth of the LORD shall name.
lineList.cn: 列国必见你的公义，列王必见你的荣耀。你必得新名的称呼，是耶和华亲口所起的。

lineList.en: Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the LORD, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.
lineList.cn: 你在耶和华的手中要作为华冠，在你神的掌上必作为冕旒。

lineList.en: Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzibah, and thy land Beulah: for the LORD delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married.
lineList.cn: 你必不再称为撇弃的，你的地也不再称为荒凉的，你却要称为我所喜悦的，你的地也必称为有夫之妇。因为耶和华喜悦你，你的地也必归他。

lineList.en: For as a young man marrieth a virgin, so shall thy sons marry thee: and as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, so shall thy God rejoice over thee.
lineList.cn: 少年人怎样娶处女，你的众民（民原文作子）也要照样娶你。新郎怎样喜悦新妇，你的神也照样喜悦你。

lineList.en: I have set watchmen upon thy walls, O Jerusalem, which shall never hold their peace day nor night: ye that make mention of the LORD, keep not silence,
lineList.cn: 耶路撒冷阿，我在你城上设立守望的。他们昼夜必不静默。呼吁耶和华的，你们不要歇息，

lineList.en: And give him no rest, till he establish, and till he make Jerusalem a praise in the earth.
lineList.cn: 也不要使他歇息，直等他建立耶路撒冷，使耶路撒冷在地上成为可赞美的。

lineList.en: The LORD hath sworn by his right hand, and by the arm of his strength, Surely I will no more give thy corn to be meat for thine enemies; and the sons of the stranger shall not drink thy wine, for the which thou hast laboured:
lineList.cn: 耶和华指着自己的右手和大能的膀臂起誓，说，我必不再将你的五谷给你的仇敌作食物，外邦人也不再喝你劳碌得来的新酒。

lineList.en: But they that have gathered it shall eat it, and praise the LORD; and they that have brought it together shall drink it in the courts of my holiness.
lineList.cn: 惟有那收割的要吃，并赞美耶和华。那聚敛的要在我圣所的院内喝。

lineList.en: Go through, go through the gates; prepare ye the way of the people; cast up, cast up the highway; gather out the stones; lift up a standard for the people.
lineList.cn: 你们当从门经过经过。豫备百姓的路。修筑修筑大道。捡去石头。为万民竖立大旗。

lineList.en: Behold, the LORD hath proclaimed unto the end of the world, Say ye to the daughter of Zion, Behold, thy salvation cometh; behold, his reward is with him, and his work before him.
lineList.cn: 看哪，耶和华曾宣告到地极，对锡安的居民（原文作女子）说，你的拯救者来到。他的赏赐在他那里，他的报应在他面前。

lineList.en: And they shall call them, The holy people, The redeemed of the LORD: and thou shalt be called, Sought out, A city not forsaken.
lineList.cn: 人必称他们为圣民，为耶和华的赎民。你也必称为被眷顾不撇弃的城。
